name: Christmas Tea
description: Sip back and enjoy the warm holiday flavours of cinnamon, orange, and cranberry expertly combined with Assam black tea.
preparation: Pour freshly boiled water over tea. Steep 3–5 minutes.
Sweeten to taste. Enjoy it plain or with milk.
tips: For an Iced Tea, brew at double strength, pour over ice, and sweeten to taste.
For a Spiked Afternoon Tea, add 1 oz dark rum, bourbon, or Grand Marnier® to 1 cup brewed tea.
